ESP.ORIGINAL:
The CANDLE fusion power system provides power to all bunker systems. Built more for reliability and duration of service, the power output of the system has been exceeded by many current designs, but it can supply the bunker with power for an estimated 752 years.
System Goals: The ultimate purposes of plant operations are controlled generation of electricity and the maintenance of safety.
Warning: CONTROL ROOM SYSTEMS FOR USE BY TRAINED AND CERTIFIED PERSONNEL ONLY!
The term "control room systems" (CRS), refers to the entire human-machine interface for the nuclear stations including the main control room, back-ups control room and the emergency control rooms, local panels, technical support centres, operating staff, operating procedures, operating training programs, communications.
ESP.TRADUIT:
“蜡烛”核聚变动力系统，为地堡中的所有系统提供能源。为了维持供电的可靠与稳定性，系统的输出功率已经超过了许多当前的设计标准，但它仍可以为地堡提供大约752年的电力。
系统目标：设施运作的最终目的是控制发电和维护安全。
警告：控制室系统仅供经过培训和认证的人员使用！
“控制室系统”（CRS）一词是指核电站的整个人机界面，包括主控制室、备用控制室和应急控制室、本地面板、技术支持中心、操作人员、操作程序、操作培训计划、通信。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
